references.paper_title: Rich feature hierarchies for accurate object detection and semantic segmentation
references.reason: This paper introduced R-CNN, a foundational two-stage object detection framework that significantly impacted the field.

references.paper_title: Faster r-cnn: Towards real-time object detection with region proposal networks
references.reason: Faster R-CNN improved upon R-CNN by integrating region proposal generation into a single network, boosting speed and performance.

references.paper_title: Feature pyramid networks for object detection
references.reason: Feature Pyramid Networks (FPN) addressed the challenge of multi-scale object detection by building a feature hierarchy, enhancing accuracy across different object sizes.

references.paper_title: Focal loss for dense object detection
references.reason: Focal Loss was introduced to address class imbalance in object detection datasets, leading to significant improvements in accuracy, especially for dense object scenarios.

references.paper_title: FCOS: Fully convolutional one-stage object detection
references.reason: FCOS proposed a fully convolutional one-stage detector that simplified the detection process by directly regressing object bounding boxes from feature maps, offering a faster and more efficient alternative to two-stage methods.
